MERGE INTO single_productlist A USING (select distinct * from paylist where buyer_num=#{buyer_num} and merchant_uid=#{merchant_uid}) B ON (B.buyer_num=A.buyer_num) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET left_count = (select left_count from basic_chat_count where user_num=#{buyer_num}) + (select left_count from single_productlist where product_num=#{product_num} and buyer_num=#{buyer_num}) + (#{paid_count}*5) , paid_date=#{paid_date} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (product_num, buyer_num, paid_date, left_count) VALUES (#{product_num}, #{buyer_num}, #{paid_date},(select charge_count from product_info where product_num=#{product_num}))

MERGE INTO set_productlist A USING (select buyer_num from paylist where buyer_num=#{buyer_num} and merchant_uid=#{merchant_uid}) B ON (B.buyer_num=A.buyer_num and A.product_num=#{product_num}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET expiry_date = (select to_char(to_date(a.expiry_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')+#{paid_count}*30 ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') sdate from (select expiry_date from set_productlist where buyer_num=#{buyer_num} and product_num=#{product_num}) a) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (product_num, buyer_num, paid_date, expiry_date) VALUES (#{product_num}, #{buyer_num}, #{paid_date}, #{expiry_date})
